remarks: The mapping of a subspace of vector space H is a subspace in the dual space of functionals with closed kernels.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Jan-2015.)
statement:
mapdlss.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdlss.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdlss.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdlss.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
mapdlss.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdlss.t $e |- T = ( LSubSp ` C ) $.
mapdlss.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdlss.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. S ) $.
mapdcl2 $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` R ) e. T ) $.
